subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Twins unveiled the long-awaited design of their new stadium on Thursday, describing a cozy urban ballpark with great sightlines, subtle reminders of the state’s beauty and a view of the Minneapolis skyline.
snippet: The Minnesota Twins unveiled the long-awaited design of their new stadium on Thursday, describing a cozy urban ballpark with great sightlines, subtle reminders of the state’s beauty and a view of the Minneapolis skyline.
